name: A Chaingun Zombie Fest Free
description:
Do you slay zombies for a living? The world has ended as we know it and zombies are everywhere. You must hunt, kill and eliminate the zombies with massive weapons and deep supplies! Do not die, stay alive another day...

* Awesome 3D apocalyptic environments!
* Waves of zombies to slaughter with super weapons!
* Game Center Leaderboards

DOWNLOAD AND SHOOT TODAY!
